flashcards.question: How many daily active Facebook users are there?
flashcards.answer: 864 million daily active users on average for September 2014

flashcards.question: How many mobile daily active Facebook users are there?
flashcards.answer: 703 million mobile daily active users on average for September 2014

flashcards.question: How many monthly active Facebook users are there?
flashcards.answer: 1.35 billion monthly active users as of September 30, 2014

flashcards.question: How many mobile monthly active Facebook users are there?
flashcards.answer: 1.12 billion mobile monthly active users as of September 30, 2014

flashcards.question: How many monthly active Twitter users are there?
How many Tweets are sent per day?
flashcards.answer: 500 million Tweets are sent per day

flashcards.question: How many active Twitter users are on mobile?
flashcards.answer: 80% of Twitter active users are on mobile
